name: TiQal
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2, Local Multiplayer 2, HD (High Definition). Unlock the full version of TiQal to enjoy all 120 levels of block-busting challenge, plus achievements, 14 unique powerups, and more! Adventure by yourself, or join a friend on Xbox LIVE to team up in multiplayer Co-Op mode. Do you have the skill to complete your quest and save TiQal village from doom? There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
